                            Tower Heist (2011)                          
   When a group of hard working guys find out they've fallen victim to  
    a wealthy business man's Ponzi scheme, they conspire to rob his     
                           high-rise residence.                         
                                                                        
                                                                  
                                                                      
                                                                  
                               6.8/10                             
                               3,082 Votes.                       
                                                                  
                                                                  
                                                                        
                                                                        
                  <a href=" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0471042/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0471042/</a>                 
                                                                        
                                                                        
                                                                        
                                                                        
    
    
                                                                            
                                                                            
    
    
                                                                        
                                               
                                                       
                                                         
                                                        
                                                   
                                                        
                                                         
                                                       
                                                   
                                                                        
               +-----------------------------------------+              
               |       Video Source: HP (Thanks!)       |              
               |       Audio Source: HP (Thanks!)       |              
               |       Others Used : None!              |              
               +-----------------------------------------+              
                                                                        
                         Encoder/Ripper: SMiLE                         
                                                                        
   READNFO part is just because of the quality, it really isn't the     
   best CAM ever made - But it is watchable. Just keep in mind that     
   it is free. We would like to say thanks to HP for the decent CAM.    
   Video had black borders and a pretty low res, audio isn't the best   
   it's got that CAM feel to it, but it was in sync. So we took the     
   file and dropped it in to filtering. There we cropped the borders,   
   resized to what we think is a suitable res - Before then running     
   several filters to touch up the video. Took around 5 hours to        
   encode but it's worth it, audio we left untouched as we did not      
   have the time to filter it. We were going to do a conversion to MP4  
   but the AVi already has a low file size and we found it pointless.   
   In the end what we are left with is a very sweet first CAM, yes the  
   audio could be better but what can you do? Some groups who upscaled  
   the video ended up with a squashed/flat video - Ours isn't. Last     
   thing to say is - Enjoy!                                            
                                                                        
                           +-------------------+

                           |   Video: 8/10     |                        
                           |   Audio: 6.5/10   |                        
                           |   Total: 14.5/20  |

        anybody that enjoys a more practical and easy download.         
        We reccommend that you update your codecs before you down       
        load any of our releases. Our releases are best viewed/         
        watched on VLC MEDiA Player. As always, Enjoy. 
